transcript: I mean, you can take those things out of a war, but when you drive the car, you've got to realize that it came out of the love a man can have for a man. You've got to be a little better because of it.

to realize that it came out of the love a man can have for a man.
You've got to be a little better because of it.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean, you can take those things out of a war, but when you drive that car, you've gotta realize that it came out of the love a man can have for a man.  You've gotta be a little better because of it.
